login.loginQuestion: Have you been onboarded with Pine Labs?
login.disclaimer: By signing in, you agree to the  Privacy Policy and T&C
login.mobileEmailSignIn: Sign In using Mobile no. or Email
login.invalidMob: Please enter a valid mobile number
login.unregisteredMob: Unregistered mobile number, try another number/email or user ID else sign up
login.invalidUserIdNAttempts: Please enter a valid user id (<n> attempts remaining)
login.invalidUserIdLastAttempt: Please enter a valid user id (1 attempt remaining)

otp.title: OTP Verification
otp.verificationHeading2Channels: Enter the verification code sent to <channel1> & <channel2>
otp.support: Get in touch with our support team to get registered credentials updated.
otp.invalidOtpNAttempts: Please enter a valid OTP (<n> attempts remaining)
otp.invalidOtpLastAttempt: Please enter a valid OTP (1 attempt remaining)
otp.invalidOtpNAttemptsRetry: We are sorry to inform you that you’ve entered incorrect OTP <n>. You can try again.
otp.incorrectUserId: We are sorry to inform you that you’ve entered incorrect user ID <n> times. You can try again.
otp.mobileMainNotFound: Mobile Number & Email ID Not Found
otp.mobileMainNotFoundMsg: We couldn’t find a valid Mobile Number or Email ID registered to your account. Please get in touch with our support team.
otp.otpRegisteredMobile: An OTP will be sent on your registered mobile number

passwordReset.title: Set Password
passwordReset.repeatPwdError: Cannot be the last three passwords
passwordReset.successMsg: Awesome, you’ve successfully updated your password
passwordReset.matchConditions: Please enter a password that meets all of the above requirements.
passwordReset.newPwd: Please enter the new password first.

languageSettings.heading: Choose Your Preferred Language
languageSettings.settings: You can change the language later from 'settings'

profile.primaryContactDesc: Primary contact no. is used to login and for communications with PineLabs
profile.emailDesc: Email ID can be used to receive alerts, promotions and as alternate contact
